mapper.select: select id, ticket_serial, ticket_no, ticket_price, carriage_no, seat_no, seat_class, sms, ticket_password, ticket_verify_code, ticket_order_num, ticket_phone, checkin_nos from union_order.ticket_info where id = #{id}

select id, ticket_serial, ticket_no, ticket_price, carriage_no, seat_no, seat_class, sms, ticket_password, ticket_verify_code, ticket_order_num, ticket_phone, checkin_nos from union_order.ticket_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into union_order.ticket_info(ticket_serial, ticket_no, ticket_price, carriage_no, seat_no, seat_class, sms, ticket_password, ticket_verify_code, ticket_order_num, ticket_phone, checkin_nos) values (#{ticketSerial}, #{ticketNo}, #{ticketPrice}, #{carriageNo}, #{seatNo}, #{seatClass}, #{sms}, #{ticketPassword}, #{ticketVerifyCode}, #{ticketOrderNum}, #{ticketPhone}, #{checkinNos})
mapper.update:
update union_order.ticket_info
ticket_serial = #{ticketSerial},
ticket_no = #{ticketNo},
ticket_price = #{ticketPrice},
carriage_no = #{carriageNo},
seat_no = #{seatNo},
seat_class = #{seatClass},
sms = #{sms},
ticket_password = #{ticketPassword},
ticket_verify_code = #{ticketVerifyCode},
ticket_order_num = #{ticketOrderNum},
ticket_phone = #{ticketPhone},
checkin_nos = #{checkinNos},
where id = #{id}
